version_description:
- Added 'Experimental Gameplay' option - now you can enable this directly in Plug Toolbox
- Added player dimension (now you can set which dimension you are in)
- Fixed a world import bug

• Now even more items you can't normally get in the game normally or even with /give and cheats! - Only Plug Toolbox can get you these items!
• A HUGE item update - Added every single item in Minecraft, even if you can't obtain it normally in game! - This is now the most complete list of items anywhere, and ALL can be obtained using Plug Toolbox :)
• Added 'Education Features' option - now you can enable this directly in Plug Toolbox without needing 'Cheats' and loosing achievements.
• Added all Aquatic items, and all entities.

- v1.6
• Now you can import and edit your existing Minecraft worlds easily! Add Items with level 32767 Enchants to your existing worlds :)
• Fixed a bug importing very old worlds

- v1.5
• Now even more items you can't normally get in the game or even with /give and cheats! - Only Plug Toolbox can get you these items!
• A HUGE item update - Added every single item in Minecraft, even if you can't obtain it normally in game! - This is now the most complete list of items anywhere, and ALL can be obtained using Plug Toolbox :)
• Added 'Education Features' option - now you can enable this directly in Plug Toolbox without needing 'Cheats' and loosing achievements.
• Added all Aquatic items, and all entities.

- v1.6/1.61
• Now you can import and edit your existing Minecraft worlds easily! Add Items with level 32767 Enchants to your existing worlds :)
• Fixed a bug importing very old worlds
• Fixed a bug with some configs

- v1.5
• Now even more items you can't normally get in the game or even with /give and cheats! - Only Plug Toolbox can get you these items!
• A HUGE item update - Added every single item in Minecraft, even if you can't obtain it normally in game! - This is now the most complete list of items anywhere, and ALL can be obtained using Plug Toolbox :)
• Added 'Education Features' option - now you can enable this directly in Plug Toolbox without needing 'Cheats' and loosing achievements.
• Added all Aquatic items, and all entities.

- Added new inventory type for Minecraft 1.6.2+
- Added Insomnia
- Added custom DMG values for known items
- Added new items
- Fixed an issue where inventory could not be changed for imported worlds
- Fixed export bug - some devices were unable to export to Minecraft
- Fixed world creation time set in the past when exported

1.71
- Fixed a bug which caused time in the world to not work properly.
- Fixed bugs from Minecraft v1.7.0 and above

1.70
- Added new inventory type for Minecraft 1.6.2+
- Added Insomnia
- Added custom DMG values for known items
- Added new items
- Fixed an issue where inventory could not be changed for imported worlds
- Fixed export bug - some devices were unable to export to Minecraft
- Fixed world creation time set in the past when exported

- Added changes for latest Minecraft
- Now you can import worlds from Minecraft into Toolbox directly on your device (No need for iTunes or a Computer)
- Fixed several reported bugs
- Now Toolbox knows and handles which items can and can't be stacked as well as the maximum stack size!

- Fixed an issue on iOS13 - Please note the slightly different instructions for exporting a world when on iOS 13 and above
- Fixed issues importing certain types of worlds
- Added our Discord Server for support :)

- Fixed an issue on iOS13 - Please note the slightly different instructions for exporting a world when on iOS 13 and above
- Fixed issues importing certain types of worlds
- Added our Discord Server for support :)

- Fixed an issue with importing with Files App
- Fixed an issue on iOS13 - Please note the slightly different instructions for exporting a world when on iOS 13 and above
- Fixed issues importing certain types of worlds
- Added our Discord Server for support :)

** Now you can import worlds from Minecraft directly from the App - Tap 'Import' on the Worlds Tab **

- Fixed an issue exporting worlds on iOS 13.2+
- Fixed an issue with some blocks (eg command block)
- Added ALL new items - bats, foxes etc!
- Updated instructions for importing and exporting worlds

** Now you can import worlds from Minecraft directly from the App - Tap 'Import' on the Worlds Tab **

- Fixed an issue exporting worlds on iOS 13.2+ (Permission issue)
- Fixed an issue with some blocks (eg command block)
- Added ALL new items - bats, foxes etc!
- Updated instructions for importing and exporting worlds
